# Secp256k1-zkp PHP Library Example

Run the following commands from inside this directory to run this example. This example demonstrates how to perform all the secp256k1-zkp functions that this library implements.
```
composer require nicolasflamel/secp256k1-zkp
php index.php
```

If ran successfully, it should display something similar to the following.
```
Validating private key
Private key is valid
Getting public key
Public key: 03e7e3dd547cc3171ffdc403824fcc5d5d03712a29f459ca10668c2864c088e951
Adding private keys
Private key sum: 0b9d3481f3279a464780437a096d0c5afe428c42ecae98d1807375ad52a15f82
Getting blinding factor
Blinding factor: b58549c27426759f5005858b107fad4f576de3040390988548dbd6b0a9937a0a
Getting commitment
Commitment: 08883a3f816419d4ce5bf44e320c24c5b09b0621c70fb780d7a35c86570bd35475
Getting Bulletproof
Bulletproof: 
Getting private nonce
Private nonce: 196dc2f39f04e984bed89ab5481a21962d5ea4be58b122dc75d4cefbdcfe81ad
Combining public keys
Combined public key: 02fa0b2a4aa3bec764d895f2ac631b7c91ac3696847d08fa1b5ce51aa9df8c1a3e
Getting partial single-signer signature
Partial single-signer signature: ee7c6c4b5267b2cf44260d3a74ea9784ef35b58f3be0b264e61cc7ecfaccfbfdbb831796c73472fed939fe197cd3a091e394b8347de4e020471f085361b58a42
Converting public key to commitment
Commitment: 08883a3f816419d4ce5bf44e320c24c5b09b0621c70fb780d7a35c86570bd35475
```
